author: kolbyml
content: Ok the Trin State nodes are updated with a default max radius of 5%. Trin Execution now has a 0.048% to 0.052% decline rate on offering State diffs. Currently we offer to 2  nodes minimum then if those are declined keep trying to offer until we get a success or 8 declined/failed offers then give up.

author: kolbyml
content: That is pretty decent compared to our decline rate before this change where it was extremely common for state content to not make it to the network or at least find logs of it, I forgot to record the numbers to compare it with.

author: kolbyml
content: Hopefully with a few more bug fixes and performance improvements we can get the success rate to 99.9999% instead of our current 99.9476%, 99.9476% is good, but not good enough of course

author: kolbyml
content: I am still waiting for 3 more state nodes to deployed near the end of the key range, but we have coverage so it will be interesting to see if it makes a difference, but I am not sure if it would be that notable, as we already have coverage on the full key range
